Event_GetAlertMonitoringThreatCasesWSReq.description: Request object for retrieving alert monitoring threat cases with filtering and pagination options.

afterTimestampMs.description: Filter for threat cases after this timestamp

beforeTimestampMs.description: Filter for threat cases before this timestamp

deviceFilter.description: List of device UUIDs to filter by

locationFilter.description: List of location UUIDs to filter by

maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return

mostRecent.description: Whether to return only the most recent threat cases

statusFilter.description: List of threat case statuses to filter by

Event_GetAlertMonitoringThreatCasesWSRes.description: Response object containing alert monitoring threat cases with pagination information.

Event_GetClipsWithProgressWSRequest.description: Request object for retrieving clips with progress information and filtering options.

deviceUuidFilters.description: Device uuids to filter clips by.

excludeAlertMonitoringClips.description: Filter to exclude clips created for alarm monitoring verification.

filterByPrivate.description: Filter to only include private clips in the result.

locationUuidFilters.description: Location uuids to filter clips by.

pageToken.description: Page token received from the previous search request.

timestampFilterField.description: Timestamp to filter clips by (either clip creation date or clip footage date).

timestampMsAfter.description: Timestamp to find clips after this time.

timestampMsBefore.description: Timestamp to find clips before this time

Event_GetClipsWithProgressWSResponse.description: Response object containing clips with progress information.

pageToken.description: Token to be supplied on the next search request to get the next page. If token is null, there is no more data available.

savedClips.description: List of saved clips with progress information
